TopicTitle: Game Crash with 3.75M decoupler and 3.75M Fairing

Articles.Content:
Don't need to say too much here. It seems as though any rocket that includes a 3.75M decoupler and 3.75M fairing has a high likely-hood of crashing the game. I made some effort to experiment with what causes it. But I have to wait a minute or more between tests for the game to reload. I've already spent about an hour and a half: here is what I know:

-Crash always occurs when decoupler is activated. Doesn't matter if it is done through staging or manually.

-Part count seems to affect the likelyhood of a crash. Small rockets normally won't crash the game. Larger rockets (300ish parts) have an almost 100% rate of crashing the game.

-Deployment of the fairing before/after using the decoupler does not seem to prevent a crash from happening.

-No crashes when using smaller sized decouplers or fairings
Are you still having this issue? I constantly get this crash.
Hi Kuansenhama, please see this thread, we need your logs and an example craft, thank you.
Can you provide any log/crafts? have you been able to reproduce the problem with certain steps?
